text:
e="preserve">Ashok Gasti (1965 – 17 September 2020) was an Indian politician and a lawyer. He was born in Raichur, Karnataka. He represented Karnataka in the Rajya Sabha for less than 3 months until his death in 2020. He was a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party.
Gasti died of COVID-19 on 17 September 2020 at a hospital near Udupi, Karnataka at the age of 55.
